price: E Lot, quando disse a seu povo: "Vós vos achegais à obscenidade, em que ninguém, nos mundos, se vos antecipou?"
arabic: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةَ مَا سَبَقَكُم بِهَا مِنۡ أَحَدٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walūṭan idh qāla liqawmihi atatūna al-fāḥishata mā sabaqakum bihā min aḥadin mina al-ʿālamīna
